codes.CHQB: (Ultimate) creditor must be paid by cheque.
codes.HOLD: Amount of money must be held for the (ultimate) creditor, who will call. Pay on identification.
codes.PRTK: Indicates that a payer token is requested/used.
codes.TELB: Please advise/contact (ultimate) creditor/claimant by the most efficient means of telecommunication.
codes.VLTK: Additional validation information to be used in conjunction with the token.

description: Specifies further instructions concerning the processing of a payment instruction, as provided to the creditor agent.
name: ExternalDebtorAgentInstruction1Code
